price: ឬមួយពួកគេមានម្ចាស់ដែលត្រូវគោរពសក្ការៈផេ្សងពី អល់ឡោះ? អល់ឡោះមហាស្អាតស្អំអំពីអ្វីដែលពួកគេធ្វើស្ហ៊ីរិក នោះ។
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: am lahum ilāhun ghayru al-lahi sub'ḥāna al-lahi ʿammā yush'rikūna
